meanings.definition: The process of forming atheromas in the arteries.
meanings.sent1: Atherogenesis can lead to blockages in the arteries.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study atherogenesis to understand heart disease better.
meanings.sent3: The atherogenesis in the arteries seemed to be throwing a party!
meanings.sent4: The slow atherogenesis in his veins was like a creeping shadow.
meanings.sent5: The dangerous atherogenesis was like a silent intruder in his body.

meanings.sent1: Atherogenesis is a key factor in heart health.
meanings.sent2: Proper diet and exercise can help prevent atherogenesis.
meanings.sent3: The atherogenesis in his body was like a mischievous prankster.
meanings.sent4: The rapid atherogenesis was like a storm brewing inside him.
meanings.sent5: The relentless atherogenesis was like a ticking time bomb.
